text: The 1991 Formula One season was the 42nd edition of the championship. The champion was Ayrton Senna. McLaren won the constructors championship. == Drivers and constructors == Entrant Constructor Chassis Engine Tyre No Driver Rounds Honda Marlboro McLaren McLaren-Honda MP4/6 Honda RA121E 3.5 V12 1
